Colombia’s prosecution said it may drop terrorism and conspiracy charges filed against people who took part in anti-government protests in 2021. The prosecution confirmed that Justice Minister Nestor Osuna formally…

title: Colombia may drop charges against participants in 2021 protests

title: Colombia’s army says it reported 120 alleged arms traffickers
